title: Veggie Chef
description: Spiced up classic dishes and some rarities, all in vegan versions. Find special salads, veg sausage dishes, fried rice with salted "fish," wild curry, and others. Relaxed atmosphere in a spacious green tinted room with light wooden furniture. Easily accessed from the street. A slightly sloping entrance with one step to get indoors. Park along the street on the opposite side. Address in Thai: 126/86 ถนน วัชรพล.
